name: Division / Remainder
description: (x^5 + 1)/(x^2 + 1) is (x^3 - x) remainder (x+1). (x^5 + 1) can be represented as 100001b, or 33 in decimal. (x^2 + 1) can be represented as 101b, or 5 in decimal. their remainder can be represented as 11b, or 3 in decimal. Using this representation of numbers, calculate the remainder of N / M, where N and M are two numbers given in decimal, separated by a space
